## BIO

I am a computational neuroscience enthusiast with signal processing expertise. A passionate explorer at the intersection of computational neuroscience, signal processing, and data science. My diverse interests span from analyzing neural signals (spikes/fMRI/EEG/DTI) to developing cutting-edge dynamic models for neuroscientific applications. When not immersed in code or scientific literature, you might find me contemplating the next big question in computational neuroscience over a cup of tea.

## Research Interests

1.  Computational Neuroscience
2.  Signal Processing
3.  Statistics and Probability
4.  Data Science
